籤詩版本二:
Ua hoʻolālā au i ka ʻoihana mai koʻu wā kamaliʻi, no laila ʻaʻole pono wau e noi i ka waiwai a me ka waiwai.
Inā ʻimi nā kānaka ʻelua i kahi mea, e hele ka haumāna a hoʻi mai me ka makana kiʻekiʻe.
詩意:
ʻO kēia hexagram ka hōʻailona o ka ʻoihana mai ka wā kamaliʻi.
E hooikaika a me ka malama i na mea a pau a me ka hopohopo ole.
解曰: Mai ka wā kamaliʻi a hiki i ka wā makua. ʻAʻohe keʻakeʻa, ʻaʻohe keʻakeʻa. E hoʻolālā. Hele mālie ka kaulana.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ua uku ʻo Cai Qing i kāna lokomaikaʻi (Cai Yong)
Ua hānau ʻia ʻo Cai Yong, ʻo Bojie ka inoa aloha, ma Chenliuyu (i kēia manawa ma ka hema o Qixian County, Henan Province). He haumana ʻo ia a he kāne ʻo Zhao Wuniang. ʻElima makahiki i hala aku nei, ua ʻimi ka ʻaha emepera i nā talena ma ka papa inoa melemele, a ua ʻōlelo ke kalana iā ia e hele mai i Beijing e lawe i ka hoʻokolokolo. Mai ia manawa, ʻaʻohe lono.
ʻO ka makahiki mua ma hope o ka haʻalele ʻana ʻo Cai Bojie ua maʻalahi ka mālama ʻana.
I ka makahiki aʻe, ua loaʻa ʻo Chenliu i kahi maloʻo nui, no laila ua hilinaʻi ʻo ia iā Zhao Wuniangdian e kūʻai aku i nā mea nani e ola ai i ka wī.
ʻEkolu makahiki ka lōʻihi o ka maloʻo i kēia wā. Ua kōkua ʻo Zhang Guangcai, kahi hoalauna ma ke kauhale, iā ia i kēlā me kēia manawa.
Ma hope mai, ua lanakila ʻo Cai Bojie i ka makana mua a hoʻi i ka home e ʻike ua kōkua ʻia kāna wahine e Zhang Guangcai. Ua hele lāua i ka hale o Zhang e hōʻike i ko lāua mahalo a hāʻawi iā Zhang Guangcai i ʻelua taele kālā i makana.
聖意: Ua maluhia ka home, ua pono ka pono, ua holomua ka oihana, ua pomaikai ka mare ana, ua pomaikai ka hanau ana o ke keikikane, ua piha ke kula i ka enuhe kilika, ua waiwai na holoholona eono, ua holomua ka imi ana, ua holomua ka hoopii. , holomua ka neʻe ʻana, maikaʻi ka waiwai nalowale, ʻo ka maʻi ʻo Anshan lua, laki maikaʻi
古人: Ua uku ʻo Cai Qing i kāna lokomaikaʻi (Cai Yong)
